consent.title: Research Study Consent
consent.intro: You are invited to participate in a research study about consumer behavior and technology. This study will take approximately 8 minutes to complete.
consent.answerQuestions: Answer questions about your perceptions and intentions
consent.voluntary: Voluntary - you can withdraw at any time
consent.anonymous: Anonymous - your responses will not be linked to your identity
consent.confidential: Confidential - data will be stored securely
consent.noRisks: There are no anticipated risks from participating in this study. Your participation will contribute to scientific knowledge about consumer behavior.
consent.agreement: By clicking "I Agree" below, you indicate that you have read this information and agree to participate in this study.
consent.disagreed: Thank you for your interest. If you change your mind, you can return to participate at any time.

screening.title: Screening Questions
screening.socialMediaFreq: How often do you use social media?
screening.notEligible: Thank you for your interest. Unfortunately, you do not meet the eligibility criteria for this study (must be 18+ and use social media at least weekly).

stimulus.title: Advertisement
stimulus.instructions: Please carefully view the advertisement below. Take your time to read and examine it.
stimulus.viewingTime: Please view the advertisement for at least 6 seconds before continuing.

items.cog1: This advertisement provides accurate information about the product
items.cog2: I can rely on this advertisement as a source of product information.
items.cog3: This advertisement helps me understand what the product is like.
items.cog4: Overall, this advertisement is useful for deciding whether the product is right for me.
items.aff2: This advertisement presents the product in a fair way.
items.aff3: This advertisement seems to have consumers' best interests in mind.
items.aff4: This advertisement feels respectful toward people like me.

items.pi1: I would seriously consider buying this product.
items.pi2: I am likely to buy this product in the near future.
items.pi3: If I needed a product like this, I would choose this one.
items.pi4: I would search for more information about this product
items.wtp1: I would be willing to pay the typical price for this product.
items.wtp2: Based on the advertisement, I would be willing to pay a higher price for this product compared to alternatives.
items.wtp3: I feel comfortable paying the suggested price for this product.

wtp.title: Willingness to Pay
wtp.question: How much would you be willing to pay for this product?
wtp.slider: Adjust the slider to indicate your maximum willingness to pay

manipulation.title: Manipulation Checks
manipulation.perceivedAuthor: Who do you think created the advertisement you just saw?
manipulation.noticedDisclosure: Did you notice any information about how the ad was created?

items.attitudeAI1: Overall, I feel positive about artificial intelligence.
items.attitudeAI2: I trust AI systems to make good decisions.
items.attitudeAI3: I worry about the negative impacts of AI.

attention.title: Attention Check
attention.instruction: Please click 'Agree' to show that you are paying attention:
attention.statement: I am paying attention to this survey.

debrief.title: Debrief
debrief.thankYou: Thank you for participating in this study. This research is investigating how consumers respond to AI-generated advertising content compared to human-created content.
debrief.purposeText: This study compared human-created advertisements with AI-generated advertisements, with and without disclosure. Some of the advertisements you viewed were created using AI tools, while others were created by humans.
debrief.dataText: Your responses are anonymous and will be used solely for research purposes. All data will be stored securely and analyzed in aggregate.
debrief.nextText: Your responses will be analyzed along with other participants' data to understand how disclosure of AI-generated content affects consumer trust, purchase intention, and willingness to pay.
debrief.contact: If you have any questions about this study, please contact the research team.

thankYou.title: Thank You!
thankYou.message: Your responses have been submitted successfully. Thank you for participating in this research study.
